name: ScoreJam#8 Truck Guy Game
description:
This is my submission project for ScoreJam#8

Your goal is to keep the man 
stay on truck as long as possible (balance him, u know :)

Controls:

  • Press ENTER to start
  • Press ESC to pause
  • Rress R to start again
  • Use WASD or ARROW KEYS to control the truck

Font: https://www.1001freefonts.com/advanced-pixel-7.font

Project sources: https://github.com/Mantarus/ScoreSpace2020
